name: Gems (itch) (campotech)
description:
Match Gems To Score Big!!!

Gems is a mtach 3 game that I whipped up just for the fun of it. When you match 3 gems you score points. Use the mouse to move the gems in any direction. You start out with 15 moves and you have to score as many points as you can. If you match 4 or 5 gems in a row you will gain extra moves. There are 3 different game modes.

1.Main Game

In a main game you start out with 15 moves. Move the gems to match 3 or more of the same color gems in a row to score points. You gain extra moves if you match 4 or 5 gems in a row.

2.Time Attack

In time attack you can choose to play the game in 2,5,or 10 minutes to see how many points you can score before the time expires. There is no limit of how many moves you can make.

3.Endless

This is the mode when you can play as long as you like. Click on the back button to end the game mode. There is no limit of moves you can make here.

Press The Escape key to end the game or spacebar to reset the game.
